data.title: Announcements [LWN.net]
data.text:
DebConf11 in July 2011

The annual Debian Conference, DebConf11, will take place in Banja Luka, Bosnia and Herzegovina, July 24-30, 2011. DebCamp will be held July 17-23, 2011. The call for papers and registration will open in early 2011.

Full Story (comments: none)

Events: December 9, 2010 to February 7, 2011
